SELECT mci.MEMSH_CARD_NO MEMSH_CARD_NO , mci.CUST_ID CUST_ID , mci.PAY_KIND_CD PAY_KIND_CD , mci.SPOT_PAY_YN SPOT_PAY_YN , mci.STOP_YN STOP_YN , mci.STOP_RSN STOP_RSN , mci.VALID_YN VALID_YN , mci.REG_UID REG_UID , mci.REG_DT REG_DT , mci.MOD_UID MOD_UID , mci.MOD_DT MOD_DT , ct.PROVIDER_ID PROVIDER_ID , ct.B_ID B_ID B_ID
FROM memsh_card_info mci INNER JOIN cust ct ON mci.CUST_ID = ct.CUST_ID AND mci.MEMSH_CARD_NO = #{memAuthInputNo}

SELECT PRICE
FROM rechg_price_info
WHERE 1=1
AND PROVIDER_ID = #{providerId}
AND COST_SDD < NOW() AND COST_EDD >= NOW()
